name: Honey Vanilla Clean Meltaway Cleansing Balm
about: What it is:A limited-edition cleansing balm that melts away makeup, SPF, and visible impurities..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Uneven Texture.Highlighted Ingredients:- Sunflower and Ginger Root Oils: Melt away stubborn, long-wearing makeup without stripping or drying skin..Ingredient Callouts:This product is cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This cleansing balm is formulated with buckwheat honey and upcycled vanilla to melts away waterproof makeup, SPF, and excess oil with zero residue, stripping, or visible breakouts..Clinical Results:Based on average result in clinical testing on 33 subjects after 1 use:.Clean at SephoraOur commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing effectiveness.
ingredients: -Sunflower and Ginger Root Oils: Melt away stubborn, long-wearing makeup without stripping or drying skin..-Turmeric and Moringa Extract: Remove visible impurities, dirt, SPF, and excess oil without leaving residue..-Papaya Enzymes: Naturally exfoliate pores...Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Polyglyceryl-6 Dicaprate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax, Polyglyceryl-10 Dioleate, Flavor/Aroma*, C10-18 Triglycerides, Stearyl Behenate, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Honey Extract/ Mel/ Extrait De Miel, Propolis Extract, Royal Jelly Extract, Vanilla Planifolia Fruit Extract, Glycerin,Glyceryl Laurate, Alkanna Tinctoria Root Extract, Ubiquinone, Tocopherol, Lecithin, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Vanillin, Limonene (*Natural Flavor/Arôme Naturel)...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Scoop out product with included spatula..-Gently massage onto dry skin..-For eye-makeup removal, apply to closed eyes..-Rinse with warm water or wipe off with a damp washcloth...Recycling Instructions:.-Rinse out any remaining product..-Recycle jar, inner lid, and outer packaging..-Send cap and spatula to Farmacy to be recycled via TerraCycle®. .-Email recycle@farmacybeauty.com for a free prepaid shipping label.
